common.noOneSchedule: No one has added a schedule.
common.title: Find The Perfect Time Easily And Quickly

title.card1: One Share Is All You Need
title.card2: One QR Code Is All We Need

description.main:
With just one share of the link, organize schedules

with many people and find the best time.
description.feature1:
What time works for everyone?

Simply check the best time with OneTime!
description.feature2:
Hard to find the available time?

Remove the busy ones!
description.card1: When you pre-register your schedule once, the unavailable time is automatically excluded.
description.card2: In offline, try adjusting the time with just one QR code instead of sharing the link.

onboarding.title1:
Please agree to the terms

to use the service
onboarding.title3:
Before starting,

please tell me your sleep time.
onboarding.description3: When adding a schedule to the event, you can automatically exclude sleep time.

eventDetail.peopleWhoAddedSchedules: Person who added schedule{count, plural, =1 {} other {s}}
eventDetail.emptyEventBanner:
Share the link

and find the perfect time!

alert.loginTitle: Would you like to log in?
alert.loginDescription: Your information is auto-filled, and your schedule can be saved!
alert.deleteEventTitle: Do you really want to delete the event?
alert.deleteEventDescription: If you delete the event, all schedules added to it will be removed!
alert.backButtonTitle: Do you want to leave the page?
alert.backButtonDescription: If you leave the page without adding a schedule, all the information you entered will disappear!

eventForm.selectTimeRange: Select the time range for the event.
eventForm.selectDateRange: Select the date range for the event.

scheduleAdd.passwordInfo: If you set a password, you can edit the schedule by entering the same name and password.

userDashboard.myScheduleDescription: It is automatically loaded when you enter a schedule.
userDashboard.noEvent: You haven't joined any events yet.

empty.title: You haven't joined any events yet.

everytimeScheduleEdit.title: Add Everytime Timetable
everytimeScheduleEdit.description: Copy and Paste the timetable link using the method below.
everytimeScheduleEdit.publicWarning: Please set the timetable to 'Public' temporarily. (Setting Icon -> Set sharing rights -> Public)
everytimeScheduleEdit.pendingMessage: The request is in progress. Please wait a moment.
everytimeScheduleEdit.invalidURLMessage: The entered URL is invalid. Please try again with a valid URL.
everytimeScheduleEdit.privateURLMessage: The timetable is not public. Please set the sharing rights to 'Public'.
everytimeScheduleEdit.serverErrorMessage: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again.

nickname.name: Name
nickname.noSpecialCharactersAndNumbers: Special characters and numbers cannot be used.
nickname.max50Characters: Up to 50 characters can be entered.

policyEdit.title:
Please agree to the terms

to use the service
policyEdit.toWithdrawText: Do you not agree to the terms?

withdraw.mainTitle: Do you really want to delete your account?
withdraw.title1: Your account will be deleted immediately
withdraw.description1: The information of the deleted account cannot be recovered. After deletion, your account will be deleted immediately.
withdraw.title2: All your event and schedule data will be deleted
withdraw.description2: All content written in OneTime, such as the schedules added for events, will be deleted.
withdraw.agreeText: Yes, I have confirmed the above.

404.title: This page cannot be found
404.description:
The URL you entered may be incorrect,

or the page may have been changed or deleted.

Please make sure the address is correct.

networkError.title: Network Connection Error
networkError.description: Please check your network connection and try again.
